detail_desc: Sleeveless dungaree dress in jacquard-weave viscose with a concealed zip in one side and shoulder straps with decorative buttons at the front. Unlined.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Coat in patterned faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs and patch front pockets. Lined.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Off-the-shoulder dress in airy jersey made from recycled polyester with elastication at the top and short, wide sleeves.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. V-neck, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Twisted detail at the front of the hem and a ribbed trim at the back of the hem.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and detachable belt with D-rings. Low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Wide top in scuba fabric with rounded shoulders and wide, dolman sleeves with pleats.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flared skirt.

Jumpsuit in a soft weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck at the front and opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a tie belt, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Unlined.

V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and concealed press-stud at the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum. Matching belt in woven fabric with a covered metal buckle. Width 5.5 cm.
Felted wool hat with a narrow band with a tie detail. Width of brim 8 cm.
Straight-cut jacket in faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and side pockets. Lined.
Glittery tulle skirt with an elasticated waist and sewn-on bow at the front. Lined.
Knee-length shorts in printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front pockets.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Short jersey skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
Scarf in a wool weave with a lightly felted finish and fringes along the short sides. Size 32x180 cm.
Jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow, braided shoulder straps and elastication at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide, 3/4-length legs.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Trousers in a linen and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with and elasticated drawstring waist and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs.
Leggings in a wide rib knit with an elasticated waist and flared hems.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Unlined.
Imitation leather trainers with a soft, stretchy edge and tongue in scuba fabric. Elasticated lacing at the front, a loop front and back, mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Short jumper in a soft rib knit with an unlined hood, dropped shoulders, long-sleeves and jacquard-knit, sewn-on ties at the cuffs.
Shirt jacket in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves and cuffs with a press-stud.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Two-button jacket in a cotton and linen weave with notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Welt chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Striped lining.
Turtleneck top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved cotton jersey tops in various designs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections, a detachable faux fur collar, diagonal zip at the front, zipped side pockets and zips at the cuffs. Lined.

Ankle-length joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Long, padded jacket in a quilted weave with a stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Long raglan sleeves and slits with press-studs in the sides. Lined. Filling 70% down and 30% feathers.
V-neck blouse in an airy viscose weave with pleats at the top of the shoulders, short sleeves and a box pleat at the back of the neck.

Short, A-line dress in a woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short, flounce-trimmed sleeves and laser-cut, hole-patterned scalloped edges around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Cotton hairbands in different designs. One in woven fabric with elastication at the back. One in jersey with a bow at the front.
Padded, thermal bodywarmer with a lined hood, zip at the front, side pockets and a zipped chest pocket. Lined. Regular fit. Size of chest pocket 16x20 cm.
Glittery tights in a nylon blend with an elasticated waist.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Knee-length cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and no buttons.
Fancy dress costume in jersey with a glittery skeleton print. Matching printed hood with holes for the eyes, nose and mouth. Hook and loop fastening at the back.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted inner lining.
Pile-lined jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, hood with a decorative drawstring, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Round-necked jumper in soft, loose-knit chenille yarn with a velvety-smooth finish. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length dress in a sturdy, fine knit with a boat neck and cap sleeves. Fitted top, a defined waist with a horizontal panel and a flared skirt with knitted pleats.
Set with a bow tie and braces. Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied, patterned bow tie with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short top with a slightly wider neckline, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Shorts with wide, covered elastication at the waist and contrasting colour trims at the sides and hems.

Romper suit in a soft organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Flutter sleeves, covered, gathered elastication at the top, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and narrow elastication at the hems.
Fancy dress gloves in a soft, printed knit.
Wide, 3/4-length trousers in a patterned weave. High waist with covered elastication at the back, diagonal side pockets and straight legs.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal front pockets and welt back pockets. Slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Set with a short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and a gently rounded, slightly longer back. Shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, fake front and back pockets, and a detachable D-ring belt.
Set of two best friend necklaces made from thin metal chain, each with a pendant. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
Suede ankle boots with pointed toes and tassels at the back. Satin linings and leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.

Calf-length satin dress with a deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Short puff sleeves with gathered elastication for a gently draped effect, an elasticated seam at the waist and a small frill trim around the neckline, waist and skirt. Lined at the top.

Jacket in corduroy made from a cotton blend with embroidered appliqués on the front, a pile collar and press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and press-studs at the cuffs. Pile lining.
Baby Exclusive. Blouse in a double, textured, organic cotton weave with a short frilled collar, buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Nightdresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves and a small bow at the neckline.
Oversized hoodie in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sturdy jersey with a wrapover funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Trainers in soft imitation suede with a padded top edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and textured rubber soles. The polyester content of the trainers is partly recycled.
Trousers in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly with decorative buttons. Jersey lining.
Padded soft velour toy in the shape of a princess weasel with a decorative tulle bow on her head. Removable dress in tulle and organza with a glittery print. Length approx. 25 cm.

Jumpsuit in lightweight cotton twill with a collar, buttons to the waist, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and an elasticated seam with a drawstring at the waist. Chest pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Fleece-lined hat in a soft knit containing glittery threads with an appliqué at the front, pompom on top, a scallop-edged hem and ties under the chin.
5-pocket knee-length shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details and a text print on the coin and back pocket. Adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.

Oversized jacket in washed, sturdy denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke and fake pockets with a flap and button at the top and diagonal welt front pockets. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and covered elastication at the back of the hem. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Rib-knit jumper in soft cashmere with a stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a straight hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, one-button jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Comfort blanket in soft velour with an animal-shaped head and paws. Polyester filling. Length approx. 25 cm.
